1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Message
6  ( -- * Abortable
7    abToken,
8    -- * Message
9    forbiddenInput,
10    unexpSect,
11    unkAngleText,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture     as O
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base         as B
16
17-- | Abortable scope for token.
18abToken :: (B.CodePtr cp) => [cp] -> O.Map (B.Ab b)
19abToken = B.abortable "token"
20
21-- | Forbidden input
22forbiddenInput :: String -> B.Ab a
23forbiddenInput = Left . B.abortLine "Forbidden input"
24
25-- | Unexpedted section delimiter
26unexpSect :: [String] -> B.Ab a
27unexpSect = Left . B.abortLines "Unexpedted section delimiter"
28
29-- | Unknown bracket text
30unkAngleText :: String -> B.Ab a
31unkAngleText = Left . B.abortLine "Unknown bracket text"
